tool.name: Count policistronic cuts
tool.command:
#if $bams.strand=="." count_policystr2.sh $annotation $output \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-2} $overlap
-f #for $b in $bams.treated_bams "${b.tbam_filep.file_name}" "${b.tbam_filep.metadata.bam_index}" "${b.tbam_filem.file_name}" "${b.tbam_filem.metadata.bam_index}" #if str($b['fname']) == "" 'data ${b.tbam_filep.hid} and ${b.tbam_filem.hid}' #else "${b.fname}" #end if #end for #end if
#if $bams.strand=="+" or $bams.strand=="-" count_policystr.sh $annotation $output \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4} $overlap $bams.strand
-f #for $b in $bams.treated_bams "${b.tbam_file.file_name}" "${b.tbam_file.metadata.bam_index}" #if str($b['fname']) == "" 'data ${b.tbam_file.hid}' #else "${b.fname}" #end if #end for #end if

param.name: overlap
param.label: Reads nucleotides that should overlap the gene border

tool.help:
Count policistronic reads in mitochondrial genome.
Requires annotation in format:
seq_id chromosome strand start end exon_starts exon_ends human_readable_gene_name
Author: Irina
